Node.definition: marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
literally: to finish; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities bring an object to the end of its construction phase

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: House of the Forest of Lebanon
Node.definition: literally: House of the Forest of Lebanon = a very large building in Jerusalem built by King Solomon, which consisted of four rows of pillars of cedar wood; this cedar wood likely came from the forests of Lebanon, located north of Israel
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm
= vertical height of an object
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= sequential arrangement (horizontal or veritical) of objects
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= lengths of wood ► supporting the roof of a building or incorporated in a wall

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration
= causative action by which a carpenter covers the walls and/or roof of a room on the inside with wooden panels

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= a long, thin flat piece ◄ of wood, ► used for construction work
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= sequential arrangement (horizontal or veritical) of objects
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= sequential arrangement (horizontal or veritical) of objects
= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed
= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
literally: foot; hence: = one of a series of beams or entire stories placed one above the other
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth
= upright part of a door frame; a few passages mention square door frames and in such cases the horizontal elements are also referred to as doorposts
= state in which an object has four sides of equal size
= relational linking an event to a location right in front of another location
= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed
= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
literally: foot; hence: = one of a series of beams or entire stories placed one above the other

= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm
= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration
= flat structure projecting from the roof or wall of a building or supported by pillars ► providing protection against sun, rain and wind
= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room
= large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room
= event where a dispute between two parties is settle by a judge
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= causative action by which a carpenter covers the walls and/or roof of a room on the inside with wooden panels

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= lowest part of an object
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= lowest part of an object

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= area enclosed by walls or buildings
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= relation linking a proposition to a location: the part of an object that is visible from the perspective of someone located within that object
= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= king of Egypt
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= block of stone, whether fully square or not;◄ found in nature or hewn from a quarry; ► used for building houses, walls, and other constructions
= state in which humans or objects are considered valuable and desirable
= the overall dimensions or capacity of an object
= large stone that was cut square ► so that it could be laid one on other stones to form a wall or building; ≈ associated with wealth and heaviness
= causative action by which humans smoothen the surface of stones with a stone plane or stone file (מְגֵרָה)
= heavy metal instrument with a wide rough surface, like that of a file; ► pushed and pulled across the surface of the stone until it is quite smooth
= relation linking a proposition to a location: the part of an object that is visible from the perspective of someone located within that object
= relational referring to that part of an object that is visible from a location outside of that object
= the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= top part of a building (specific nature uncertain); ≈ perhaps a layer or a structure a handbreadth in thickness or width
= relational referring to that part of an object that is visible from a location outside of that object
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= area enclosed by walls or buildings
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= causative action by which humans put in place the bottom part of a building or larger structure, usually below the ground level, which will have to bear the entire construction
= block of stone, whether fully square or not;◄ found in nature or hewn from a quarry; ► used for building houses, walls, and other constructions
= state in which humans or objects are considered valuable and desirable

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= room of relatively small size ► functioning as entrance room to a larger room

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; also known as Huram (חוּרָם) and Huram Abi (חוּרָם אָבִי) ◄ from Tyre (צֹר) craftsman; ► time of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
= town; ◄ on the Phoenician coast; ► famous as sea port
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= inhabitant of Tyre (צֹר)
= person with the skill to produce an artifact out of rough materials, such as stone, wood, metal

Node.gloss: to be filled > to be engaged
Node.definition: literally: to be filled (with an activity); hence: = state in which humans are fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: knowledge; hence: = state in which humans have the experience, skill, and expertise to carry out a particular activity
literally: to do; hence; = action by which humans and engaged in a specific activity, usually in the service of someone else
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans produce an object ◄ by pouring molten gold, silver, or bronze into a mould in the shape of that object and letting it cool off

= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration

= the direction facing right or southward from the perspective of the location in focus; ≈ associated with strength and therefore usually regarded as the favorite side; in extension: one option as opposed to another

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= pillar ► in temple of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration

= a flowering plant with an erect stem and long narrow leaves; it can grow to 1.5 m high; it has a bulbous root and cone shaped flowers, usually with 5 6 petals, which protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; ◄ Lilium candidum; ► associated with unsurpassed beauty
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: the sea; hence: = a large basin, ◄ made out of bronze (נְחֹשֶׁת) and ► used for ritual washing in the temple

= causative action by which an artifact is produced ◄ by pouring molten gold, silver, or bronze into a mold in the shape of that artifact and letting it cool off; ≈ the resulting product is considered firm and strong

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm

= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= metal container large enough to dip in with one's hands; ► used for sprinkling liquids such as water and blood

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= man; also known as Huram (חוּרָם) and Huram Abi (חוּרָם אָבִי) ◄ from Tyre (צֹר) craftsman; ► time of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction|= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a relatively flat area
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)

= causative action by which an artifact is produced ◄ by pouring molten gold, silver, or bronze into a mold in the shape of that artifact and letting it cool off; ≈ the resulting product is considered firm and strong
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again
= the area separating two or mores locations
= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד)
= the area separating two or mores locations
= town, also known as Zeredah (צְרֵדָה) and Zererah (צְרֵרָה) ◄ located in the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) valley; territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם)
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

= state in which a countable entity is five in number
‎literally: right; hence: = a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
‎literally: left; hence: = a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun
= innermost room at the back of the main temple building; ► location of the ark of the covenant; ≈ regarded as the most holy place
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

= small container ◄ made out of earthenware, ► filled with oil (שֶׁמֶן) and with a wick (פִּשְׁתָּה) placed in it; sometimes placed on a lampstand (מְנֹורָה) used as a source of light (אֹור) ≈ associated with peace, stability and well being
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

= a tool for cutting off the burnt part of the wick so that it makes less smoke when it burns
= metal container large enough to dip in with one's hands; ► used for sprinkling liquids such as water and blood
literally: palm of the hand; hence: = a relatively flat and shallow container for incense

= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
exact meaning uncertain; probably: = the pivot on which a door turns
